snippet: A stolen iPhone at a security checkpoint took one man on a winding road of encounters with the T.S.A., airport management, a private security subcontractor, and multiple police offices.
lead_paragraph: A stolen iPhone at a security checkpoint took one man on a winding road of encounters with the T.S.A., airport management, a private security subcontractor, and multiple police offices.

headline.seo: The Case of a Stolen iPhone at a San Francisco Airport
headline.main: When a Phone Disappears at Airport Security, No One’s in Charge
headline.print_headline: When a Phone Disappears at Airport Security, No One’s in Charge
